Title: Spacious 2+1 Bedroom Apartment for rent in Downtown Toronto
Amenities: Gym, Concierge, 24 Hour Security, Bicycle Parking, Elevator in Building
Description:
**Seeking Two Female Roommates for Prime Downtown Toronto Apartment**
I am currently looking for two female working professionals or students to share a spacious 2-bedroom +1 Den apartment in the heart of Toronto's Entertainment and Theatre District, located at the intersection of Blue Jays Way & King St W. This is a unique opportunity for those who appreciate modern living in a vibrant urban setting.
**Apartment Features:**
- **Location:** Situated on the 6th floor, the apartment offers beautiful south-facing views and is flooded with natural light.
- **Bedrooms:** Two well-appointed bedrooms, each offering privacy and comfort.
- **Bathrooms:** Includes two full bathrooms, ensuring convenience for all residents.
- **Kitchen & Living Area:** An open-concept layout with a fully equipped kitchen featuring high-end built-in appliances, leading into a spacious living and dining area.
- **Amenities:** The building boasts a range of luxury amenities including 24/7 concierge, a fully equipped gym, co-working space, outdoor BBQ area, and more.
**Neighborhood Highlights:**
- **Convenience:** Steps away from public transportation, Rogers Centre, Scotiabank Arena, various theatres, banks, shops, bars, and restaurants.
- **Lifestyle:** Located in a lively area known for its entertainment options, offering easy access to Toronto's best cultural and social scenes.
**Lease Details:**
- **Availability:** Immediate, with flexible viewing times available upon request. 1 year lease agreement at least.
- **Requirements:** Ideal candidates will be non-smokers and ready to provide documentation such as a credit report, employment verification, and references. A $300 key deposit is required upon signing.
**Interested?**
For more information or to arrange a viewing, please contact Rida at rida.zahraslam@gmail.com. Alternatively, feel free to direct message your phone number, and I will reach out to you.
This is a fantastic opportunity for those looking to enjoy downtown Toronto living with all the comforts and conveniences of a modern home. Looking forward to finding the perfect roommates to share this amazing space with!

Title: 165 Jameson Ave - 165 Jameson Ave Apartment for Rent
Amenities: Elevator in Building
Description: Welcome to 165 Jameson Avenue, located in trendy Parkdale near Liberty Village. Your new community is packed with specialty shops, great restaurants, bars, and boutiques. There are public schools, private schools, and Catholic schools nearby and the 501 streetcar and the 24 -hour Queen Street streetcar easily connects you to downtown Toronto in minutes. Enjoy easy access to the Gardiner Expressway if you prefer to commute by car. Your home is a short walk away from the fabulous galleries and nightlife of Queen West, the trendsetting shops of Liberty Village, and the impressive restaurants of Roncesvalles Village. The CNE, BMO Field and Allan Lamport Stadium are all near your new neighbourhood. When you need to recharge in nature, stroll on the waterfront trail along Lake Ontario to High Park – the largest park in the city.Your bright and modern rental apartment features sleek kitchens with subway tile and stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher. Relax after a long day, or get up early and watch the sunrise on your private balcony. Laundry facilities are located on-site and you'll never have to hunt for a parking space, or scrape ice off of your car, thanks to our underground parking area. Our friendly on-site management team will handle any maintenance issues, in the building or in your suite, quickly and professionally.Your new home at 165 Jameson Avenue offers you the comfort, convenience and style of city living at its best. Welcome to the next chapter of your story. Located in trendy Parkdale, near Liberty Village, your new neighbourhood is packed with chic and fun shops, bars, boutiques, specialty stores and excellent restaurants. Our property is conveniently located just a 10-second walk to the 24-hour Queen Street streetcar which will help you zip across town with ease. Commuting from here is hassle-free as we are minutes from the Gardiner Expressway and a mere 10-minute streetcar ride to the center of downtown Toronto. The fabulous galleries, shops and restaurants of Queen West are just five minutes away and you're only 10 minutes from the charming shops and restaurants of Roncesvalles Village. If you have children, you'll be pleased to learn that the area boasts private schools, public schools and Catholic schools, as well as many recreation facilities. Sports fans will love being close to BMO Field and Allan Lamport Stadium. You'll never be bored as the CNE, home to countless fun festivals, shows and events, is also only minutes away. There's a vibrant nightlife scene in the area with beloved Toronto landmarks like The Drake Hotel, Parts and Labour and The Gladstone located nearby. Nature lovers will appreciate that we are close to some of the city's best parks including High Park, Trinity Bellwoods, and the waterfront greenspaces of Marilyn Bell Park and Budapest Park.Building Overivew

Description: Focus on driving your business forward with a professional office just for you. Put Your Business on the Fast Track at the Hullmark Centre.Connect with clients throughout Toronto and across Canada with flexible, serviced office space at the Hullmark Centre. Internal access to Sheppard-Yonge subway station puts you within easy reach of 70 destinations across Canadas capital city, including Oriole Train Station, plus the neighboring city of Vaughan. Road links are also excellent. Highways 401 and 404 are both just minutes away, allowing you to access major business areas across the city and reach out to clients all over the country from Windsor in the west all the way to the Ontario-Quebec border in the east.A landmark building located in the popular Willowdale East neighborhood of Toronto, the Hullmark Centre offers a unique and very flexible working environment. Take as much space as you need from a single desk to an entire floor. Create your own private office or enjoy the flexibility of hot-desking in our social coworking areas. If you need a meeting room, you can book one in seconds with our easy-to-use app. Start the day with a workout at LA Fitness just 3 minutes walk away and end it with a meal at one of the nearby restaurants or a stroll around Willowdale Park. Make a home for your business with 86 sqft of private office space in ON, Toronto - Hullmark Center, ideal for 1 employee. Our small offices are fully serviced and have everything taken care of - from the furniture to the high-speed WiFi - so you can focus on driving your business forward. Title: 165 Jameson Ave - 165 Jameson Ave Apartment for Rent
Amenities: Elevator in Building
Description: Welcome to 165 Jameson Avenue, located in trendy Parkdale near Liberty Village. Your new community is packed with specialty shops, great restaurants, bars, and boutiques. There are public schools, private schools, and Catholic schools nearby and the 501 streetcar and the 24 -hour Queen Street streetcar easily connects you to downtown Toronto in minutes. Enjoy easy access to the Gardiner Expressway if you prefer to commute by car. Your home is a short walk away from the fabulous galleries and nightlife of Queen West, the trendsetting shops of Liberty Village, and the impressive restaurants of Roncesvalles Village. The CNE, BMO Field and Allan Lamport Stadium are all near your new neighbourhood. When you need to recharge in nature, stroll on the waterfront trail along Lake Ontario to High Park – the largest park in the city.Your bright and modern rental apartment features sleek kitchens with subway tile and stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher. Relax after a long day, or get up early and watch the sunrise on your private balcony. Laundry facilities are located on-site and you'll never have to hunt for a parking space, or scrape ice off of your car, thanks to our underground parking area. Our friendly on-site management team will handle any maintenance issues, in the building or in your suite, quickly and professionally.Your new home at 165 Jameson Avenue offers you the comfort, convenience and style of city living at its best. Welcome to the next chapter of your story. Located in trendy Parkdale, near Liberty Village, your new neighbourhood is packed with chic and fun shops, bars, boutiques, specialty stores and excellent restaurants. Our property is conveniently located just a 10-second walk to the 24-hour Queen Street streetcar which will help you zip across town with ease. Commuting from here is hassle-free as we are minutes from the Gardiner Expressway and a mere 10-minute streetcar ride to the center of downtown Toronto. The fabulous galleries, shops and restaurants of Queen West are just five minutes away and you're only 10 minutes from the charming shops and restaurants of Roncesvalles Village. If you have children, you'll be pleased to learn that the area boasts private schools, public schools and Catholic schools, as well as many recreation facilities. Sports fans will love being close to BMO Field and Allan Lamport Stadium. You'll never be bored as the CNE, home to countless fun festivals, shows and events, is also only minutes away. There's a vibrant nightlife scene in the area with beloved Toronto landmarks like The Drake Hotel, Parts and Labour and The Gladstone located nearby. Nature lovers will appreciate that we are close to some of the city's best parks including High Park, Trinity Bellwoods, and the waterfront greenspaces of Marilyn Bell Park and Budapest Park.Building Overivew

Title: Private furnished bedroom for rent
Amenities: Gym, Pool, Concierge, 24 Hour Security, Bicycle Parking, Elevator in Building
Description:
Private furnished bedroom in a shared condo is available for rent long term for single occupation. The condo is located in the heart of downtown Toronto, with less then 10 mins walk to college subway station and Eaton center.
the condo contains 2 washrooms, and 4 private rooms not including common areas, such as living room and kitchen.
you will be sharing common space with us two landlords and one tenant. also you will be assigned your own fridge and cabinets in the kitchen.
what's offered:
-6 months lease agreement will be prepared and signed upon moving in and eligible to be renewed.
- available move in date: April 1st.
- internet, utilities, on sight laundry, toilet paper, built in mirrored closet in the room, and another closet by the entrance is shared with one tenant for shoes and winter jackets. private fridge and kitchen cabinets.
- shared kitchen items such as cooking pan, cutlery, plates, etc..
- deep cleaning of common areas, and washroom, is done weekly by us (landlords).
- building amenities include: gym, party room, squash court, swimming pool, hot tub, sauna wet and dry.
- parking is available for additional $85 a month.
- our living standards:
- a safe and enthusiastic living space is the achievement, any acts that includes but not limited to, harassment, racism, anger, or disrespect will not be tolerated, and will result in a breach of the lease agreement.
- we all as landlords and tenants are welcome to have friends and family visits at any time. However friends and family sleepovers are only permitted on the weekends.
- also to maximize comfort, common areas such as living room and kitchen are only to be used by us, friends and family are not permitted to use the common space, or the washroom for the purpose of showering, but they are welcomed at anytime to your room.
-we all exercise good hygiene and make sure we clean after the use of kitchen, and common areas. to make sure our place always stay clean and welcoming.
- but deep cleaning is not to be worried about, as it is done by us landlords.
what other expenses are on you for personal use:
- dish soap
- laundry detergent
requirements:
- documentation assessing your annual income, or at least 5 months employment history.
- scan of your last two pay stubs.
- background check.
- liability insurance upon or within the first month of moving in.
feel free to contact me via messenger anytime for additional inquiries, or to schedule a viewing!

Description: Situated in a family-oriented area of Scarborough, Helen Towers is a wonderful rental community located close to several schools, a childcare centre, a community centre, public library, and shopping. Your home backs onto Treverton Park – the perfect place to walk your dog or take the kids to the playground. There is a grocery store and a Shoppers Drug Mart just steps away on Eglinton Avenue East. The TTC stops outside your door and The Kennedy subway station, the Kennedy GO station, and Scarborough RT are a short walk away – making all parts of Toronto and the GTA easily accessible.All the shopping and entertainment options of Eglinton Town Centre and Eglinton Square are minutes away as well. Centennial College Ashtonbee Campus, Ashtonbee Reservoir Park, Wexford Park and nature trails are all close by.Your bright and spacious, pet-friendly rental apartment features gleaming parquet floors and a private balcony. Enjoy the convenience of on-site laundry facilities, plenty of visitor parking, and parking available for you. Experience the peace of mind that comes with monitored security cameras and a friendly on-site management team – there to handle any maintenance issues that may arise. Helen Towers is a Certified Rental Building.If you're looking for a comfortable, convenient, and family-friendly place to call home, you can stop searching. Helen Towers (833 Kennedy Road) is ready to welcome you. nullBuilding Overivew

Title: Find office space in Spaces 325 Front Street for 1 person
Description: Set your business up for success with a professional office just for you. ELEVATE YOUR WORK AT SPACES Spaces, Spaces, 325 Front Street WEST.Take your business to new heights when you base it next to the iconic CN Tower in Toronto. Work where finance meets fun in the prime location of Spaces, Spaces, 325 Front Street West, in Old Torontos buzzing business hub and entertainment district. Easily commute and gather guests here as youre just a short walk from the subway and trains at Union Station. Create and collaborate as you work next to thriving tech companies and start-ups, in sociable coworking spaces or flexible private offices. Brainstorm your next big idea in style in our spacious, on-demand meeting rooms. Work smart in bright, modern spaces thanks to our superfast WiFi and business-grade equipment. Chat to our friendly reception team who can lighten your load and help your day go more smoothly. Enjoy the many facilities this sustainable building has to offer, from a coffee shop, restaurant and gym to 24/7 security and ample parking for cars and bicycles. When you step away from your laptop, take a head-clearing stroll in nearby parks, and at the end of the day youre surrounded by restaurants, bars, music and theatres. Create and personalise a perfectly sized environment for a team of 1 with 86 sqft of private office space in Spaces 325 Front Street. Our small offices are fully serviced, accessible 24/7, and include unlimited coworking access to our business club during business hours. And because we know how quickly business can change, well never ask you to sign your life away our contract terms are flexible and tailored to your specific needs.Spaces Private Offices include:Access to our global network with thousands of locations worldwideFriendly reception and support teamSecure, business-grade technology and Wi-FiPrinters and access to admin supportCleaning, utilities, and securityDesk space available by the hour, day, or monthRegular networking and community eventsEasy booking and account management via our appCustomisable and flexible layoutsWorkspaces that scale up and move with your businessHigh-quality ergonomic furnitureAdditional access to 538 sqft of shared workspacePricing starts at 339Just so you know; all images shown in this listing are from Spaces locations, but they may not correspond to this specific one.Get in touch.Donnez toutes les chances de réussite à votre entreprise avec un bureau professionnel juste pour vous. FAITES PASSER VOTRE TRAVAIL AU NIVEAU SUPÉRIEUR AU SPACES 323, RUE FRONT OUEST À TORONTO.Votre entreprise atteindra de nouvelles hauteurs lorsque vous l'établirez à côté de l'emblématique tour du CN. Dans cet emplacement de prestige, la finance et le divertissement vont main dans la main à cause de la proximité d'Old Town Toronto et du quartier des spectacles avec ses établissements vibrants. Déplacez-vous facilement et faites profiter vos invités de déplacements simplifiés grâce à la gare intermodale Union Station à seulement un jet de pierre. Profitez d'un environnement marqué par des entreprises de technologie florissantes et inspirez-vous-en dans le cadre de vos propres créations et du travail avec vos collaborateurs, le tout dans nos espaces de coworking et nos bureaux privés aux conditions flexibles. Réunissez votre équipe et accouchez de votre prochaine idée de génie dans l'une de nos spacieuses salles de réunion sur demande.Stimulez votre productivité dans nos espaces modernes et éclairés, et bénéficiez d'un réseau Internet ultrarapide et d'équipements de calibre professionnel. Notre sympathique équipe à la réception s'occupera de vous dépanner tout au long de la journée. Ce bâtiment durable est doté d'un service de sécurité en tout temps et vous permet de profiter d'une grande variété de commodités sur place, allant des cafés aux restos, en passant par le gymnase et le vaste stationnement pour voitures et vélos. Créez et personnalisez un environnement aux proportions idéales pour une équipe de 1 employés, avec 86 sqft de bureaux privés à Spaces 325 Front Street. Nos bureaux de petite taille sont entièrement équipés, accessibles 24 heures sur 24, 7 jours sur 7, et incluent un accès illimité en coworking à notre club d'affaires pendant les heures ouvrables. Et parce que nous sommes parfaitement conscients des différents revirements qu'une entreprise peut subir, nous ne vous demanderons jamais un engagement à vie : nous proposons des conditions contractuelles flexibles et adaptées à vos besoins spécifiques.Les bureaux privatifs Spaces incluent :L'accès à notre réseau de milliers de sites à travers le mondeUne équipe de réception et d'assistance chaleureuseL'accès à une technologie de pointe et au Wi-Fi sécuriséDes imprimantes et une assistance administrativeDes services de nettoyage, d'entretien et de sécuritéLa possibilité de réserver un bureau à l'heure, à la journée ou au moisDe fréquents évènements communautaires et de réseauUne application spécifique qui simplifie la réservation et la gestion de votre compteDes configurations flexibles et personnalisablesDes espaces de travail qui évoluent en même temps que votre entrepriseDu mobilier ergonomique de grande qualitéL'accès à 538 sqft d'espace de travail partagé supplémentaireDes tarifs à partir de 339Pour information, toutes les images qui figurent ici proviennent de sites Spaces, mais ne correspondent pas nécessairement à celui dont nous parlons ici.Nous contacter.

Backed By A Lush Ravine With Hiking And Biking Routes Connecting Downsview Park To York University, Nature Enthusiasts Will Relish The Proximity To Green Spaces And Scenic Trails. The Downsview & Wilson Subway Stations Are Just Minutes Away, Ensuring Easy Access To Toronto's Public Transit, While The Nearby 401 Highway Streamlines Your Commute. With York University And Yorkdale Shopping Centre In Close Reach, This Location Caters to Students, Professionals, And Shoppers. The Keeley Also Introduces A Host Of Vibrant Amenities, From A Tranquil Courtyard And A 7th-Floor Sky Yard With Sweeping Views, To A Pet Wash, Library And Fitness Center. Experience The Best Of North York Living At The Keeley. Where Urban Vitality Meets Natural Splendor.

Title: Studio in Downtown Toronto for Rent from May 1
Description:
Queen St. West & Spadina area of downtown Toronto:
Basement studio apartment is available from May 1st, 2024.
This apartment is located in a fully renovated (2017) Edwardian townhouse on Augusta Avenue, just north of the trendy Queen St. West. "Vogue has named Toronto's "Queen St. West" the second-hippest district in the world" (Globe and Mail, Dec. 2014) Close to everything - Kensington market, AGO, financial and art districts of downtown, restaurants, shopping, theaters etc. are within walking distance. Perfect for someone who works or studies in downtown
This basement apartment has been recently fully renovated.
It has a contemporary kitchen and appliances (gas range, dishwasher, wall mounted range hood, washer & dryer combo). There's a four-piece bathroom. Heating and cooling - central air with A/C. There's a bistro set in the yard.
The apartment has a street level den with a skylight. The private entrance is from the back alley. Utilities are extra. Street parking is available along Augusta Avenue or nearby streets by the city of Toronto permit.
The owner occupies the upper level apartment.

Description: Lord Dufferin Apartments offers stylish, renovated apartments in Liberty Village's west end. Packed with must-have on-site amenities and boasting a transit score of 100, these apartments will help you enhance your Toronto living experience. Offering pet friendly bachelor, 1 and 2 bedroom suites, you'll love the earthy tones and contemporary finishes outfitting these cozy apartments. The rental suites at Lord Dufferin Apartments feature dishwashers, balconies, and open-concept layouts, while our friendly on-site management and concierge staff address your maintenance needs and secure your peace of mind. Residents also enjoy a gym, laundry facilities, storage room with lockers, and party room all on-site; while just outside you'll find a cozy swimming pool and lounge area, plus a personal dog park for resident use. There's no shortage of amenities in Liberty Village, and Lord Dufferin Apartments puts you walking distance from some of its best. Take your workout outdoors with the paved path along Lake Ontario just steps from your door, or spend a day at the CNE, just as close by. With TTC bus and streetcar stops at your door, including 24-hour options on Queen Street, easy access to the Gardiner Expressway and QEW, and the Exhibition GO Station just minutes away, the entire city of Toronto is at your fingertips. Lord Dufferin Apartments is a Certified Rental Building and offers affordable rental living in the heart of one of Toronto's most vibrant neighbourhoods. Live at the edge of one of Toronto's most vibrant neighbourhoods, Liberty Village! The Lord Dufferin is ideal for anyone who enjoys convenience. You are minutes to 24-hour bus and streetcar transit, the Exhibition Go Station, you are walking distance to Queen West shopping, a variety of parks, restaurants, coffee shops, and grocery stores, this location has it all!Building Overivew

Description: Lord Dufferin Apartments offers stylish, renovated apartments in Liberty Village's west end. Packed with must-have on-site amenities and boasting a transit score of 100, these apartments will help you enhance your Toronto living experience. Offering pet friendly bachelor, 1 and 2 bedroom suites, you'll love the earthy tones and contemporary finishes outfitting these cozy apartments. The rental suites at Lord Dufferin Apartments feature dishwashers, balconies, and open-concept layouts, while our friendly on-site management and concierge staff address your maintenance needs and secure your peace of mind. Residents also enjoy a gym, laundry facilities, storage room with lockers, and party room all on-site; while just outside you'll find a cozy swimming pool and lounge area, plus a personal dog park for resident use. There's no shortage of amenities in Liberty Village, and Lord Dufferin Apartments puts you walking distance from some of its best. Take your workout outdoors with the paved path along Lake Ontario just steps from your door, or spend a day at the CNE, just as close by. With TTC bus and streetcar stops at your door, including 24-hour options on Queen Street, easy access to the Gardiner Expressway and QEW, and the Exhibition GO Station just minutes away, the entire city of Toronto is at your fingertips. Lord Dufferin Apartments is a Certified Rental Building and offers affordable rental living in the heart of one of Toronto's most vibrant neighbourhoods. Live at the edge of one of Toronto's most vibrant neighbourhoods, Liberty Village! The Lord Dufferin is ideal for anyone who enjoys convenience. Description: Focus on driving your business forward with a professional office just for you. Put Your Business on the Fast Track at the Hullmark Centre.Connect with clients throughout Toronto and across Canada with flexible, serviced office space at the Hullmark Centre. Internal access to Sheppard-Yonge subway station puts you within easy reach of 70 destinations across Canadas capital city, including Oriole Train Station, plus the neighboring city of Vaughan. Road links are also excellent. Highways 401 and 404 are both just minutes away, allowing you to access major business areas across the city and reach out to clients all over the country from Windsor in the west all the way to the Ontario-Quebec border in the east.A landmark building located in the popular Willowdale East neighborhood of Toronto, the Hullmark Centre offers a unique and very flexible working environment. Take as much space as you need from a single desk to an entire floor. Create your own private office or enjoy the flexibility of hot-desking in our social coworking areas. If you need a meeting room, you can book one in seconds with our easy-to-use app. Start the day with a workout at LA Fitness just 3 minutes walk away and end it with a meal at one of the nearby restaurants or a stroll around Willowdale Park. Make a home for your business with 86 sqft of private office space in ON, Toronto - Hullmark Center, ideal for 1 employee. Our small offices are fully serviced and have everything taken care of - from the furniture to the high-speed WiFi - so you can focus on driving your business forward. Find flexible office space for rent for as little as a day or stay for longer and personalise your space to suit the unique needs of your business.HQ Private Offices include:  Access to our global network with thousands of locations worldwide Highly trained reception and support team Secure, business-grade technology and WiFi Printers and access to admin support Cleaning, utilities, and security Desk space available by the hour, day, or month Regular networking and community events  Easy booking and account management via our app Customisable and flexible layouts Scale up or move locations to suit your needs High-quality ergonomic furniture Additional access to 538 sqft of shared workspace Pricing starts at 603All images shown in this listing belong to our locations but may not correspond to this specific centre.Enquire now.

All essential appliances including a stainless steel fridge, stove, hood fan, built-in dishwasher, washer, and dryer.
This home is a perfect blend of luxury living and a convenient location, making it an ideal choice for those looking to rent in Richmond Hill. With its spacious rooms, modern amenities, and proximity to key services and transportation, 60 Normandy Cres stands out as a premier leasing opportunity.

Title: All Inclusive, Furnished Single Room Avail. April 1
Description:
**PLEASE READ CAREFULLY**
*If this ad is still up, the room is still available*
SINGLE BEDROOM AVAILABLE - APRIL 1, 2024
ALL INCLUSIVE & FURNISHED
Rent: $775
Looking for a clean, quiet, respectful, MALE INTERNATIONAL student to take over a newly renovated, furnished single bedroom available for rent April 1.
*No pets
Location:
Dufferin and Eglinton -- minutes from 3 bus stops.
- Dufferin bus is 24 hours with frequent busses and is literally 1 minute away and is a 10 -- 15 minute trip to Dufferin station, and from there is another 15 minute trip to Yonge and Bloor.
- Dufferin and Eglinton is 2 blocks away, and the Eglinton bus is generally a quick bus ride to Eglinton subway station, which is the best way to get onto the University/Spadina line and will get you downtown pretty quickly.
Shops:
- No Frills (groceries) a few blocks away (5 minute walk).
- Shoppers Drug Mart a few minutes away.
- Dollarama right next to Shoppers Drug Mart.
- McDonald's and Tim Hortons locations are minutes away on both Dufferin and Eglinton.
- Yorkdale Shopping Mall is a 10 minute bus ride North on Dufferin.
- Dufferin Mall is a 10 -- 15 minute bus ride south on Dufferin and is really close to the Dufferin Subway station.
- There are banks and such along Dufferin and some other great shops.
All Inclusive:
- The rent will include:
*All hydro and utilities
*High-speed Internet
*Laundry (there is a washer and dryer on site)
*Furnishings (please see photos)
The house / room:
- Bungalow with large backyard
- Separate basement entrance
- Newly renovated room
- Newly renovated bathroom
- Updated kitchen
- Laundry on site
- Dining area, which will also serve as a common area
The roommate:
- The basement suite has 2 bedrooms, so it will be shared – currently with a male, Japanese student.
Please feel free to reply to this ad if you are interested and would like to set up an appointment to see the room.
Appointment Availability: weekdays after 6 pm; weekends after 1 pm.
**In your message, please send me some information about yourself - i.e., age, gender, occupation, where you're from, how long you're planning on being in Canada (potential length of lease), etc.** We use this as a pre-screening process before setting up an appointment to ensure you may be a right fit with the current tenant. ** IF THIS INFO IS NOT IN YOUR MESSAGE, YOU WILL NOT RECEIVE A RESPONSE.**
Thanks for your interest!

Title: Room for Rent Downtown Toronto
Description:
2nd floor room for rent asap, looking for someone to move in right away or as soon as they can.The room is furnished with a bed with mattress, desk , and closet built into the wall. The room is large, and there is a kitchen, washroom, and you will share the bathroom with the 1 other male tenant on the floor.
Room is furnished, and for the rent you only pay $925, including utilities. You only have to pay for internet which you share the cost with the other roommate or you can get your own. The room can be also unfinished if you have your own stuff.
This is the best location right on downtown, located in the heart of Kensington Market , Chinatown, walk to Eaton center or U of Toronto, all shops and restaurants and Spadina street cars on the door.
The place has heating and AC, and no onsite laundry, but a laundromat on the corner, a minute walk away.
Please respond for more info, or to set up a time to see the place.

Title: FAB LOCATION -REST OF MARCH -NICE CLEAN DECENT  APTSHARE
Description:
FOR LAST TWO WEEKS IN MARCH. (May or may not be available after that) Could be an option but not sure right at this moment.
NICE CLEAN DECENT AND VERY WELL LOCATED. CENTRAL and RIGHT NEXT TO SUBWAY.
It's a one bedroom apartment. Pretty spacious, especially the bedrom. It is very comfortable and very clean. The bedroom has two beds plus there is a couch in the living room where one can sleep as well.
Share with one lady, clean and very easy going, independent and pretty busy with own projects.
Don't mind if it is a guy or a girl....just as long as you are clean, quiet and respectful. Prefer someone who does not drink (in excess anyway) and that does not do drugs.
Here you will have a place that is clean, quiet, comfortable, cozy and safe. Can provide everything that you might need including linens. Apt. has everything. We will discuss the rent. It will be affordable ... just as long as you are clean, quiet and easy going.
Please make sure to leave a number where you can be reached and we will chat and organize a meeting.
Cheers
PS: Sorry that pictures were not well taken (do not have a good camera/and even worse photographer :) ) and does not show off the size and loveliness of the place..

Title: 2 Bedroom House for Rent in Little Italy
Description: Beautiful, renovated 2 bedroom, 2.5 bath house in the heart of Little Italy with lots of natural light and unique charm. The first floor boasts an open concept living room, dining room and kitchen and a powder room. In the living room, you’ll find a unique gas fireplace. On the second floor you’ll find a spacious primary bedroom with a vaulted ceiling and lots of closet space. The main bathroom has a claw foot tub, huge walk in shower, dual sinks and toilet room. The second bedroom and laundry room (washer, dryer & laundry sink) are also on the second floor. In the basement, you’ll find a third bedroom or home office, open living space and the second full bathroom with a big walk in shower. There is floor heating in the kitchen, bathrooms and basement. In the back, you will find private outdoor space with a carport. This house is conveniently located steps away from College St. shops and restaurants. Utilities are not included.

Title: Downtown 2 Bedroom Condo For Rent
Address: 158 Front St E, Toronto, ON M5A 0K9
Amenities: Gym, Pool, Concierge, 24 Hour Security, Bicycle Parking, Storage Space, Elevator in Building
Description:
Wake up, to the sun rising, in this 19th storey condo with a fantastic eastern view of the city.
On the 14th floor the building divides into twin towers and between these towers is an outdoor pool and lounge with absolutely breathtaking views north and south to the lake.
On the 10th floor is a large outdoor BBQ pit facing towards the lake and indoors is a large party room for all tenants to enjoy.
There are also a library and a place to shoot a game of pool and I’m not sure if they are opened yet. But what is opened is a fully equipped 2 storey gymnasium. Scheduled classes in yoga that you can join and I’ve seen notices in the elevator that suggest there are other activities as well.
The condominium is located at the intersection of Sherbourne and Front st East. There is a Cobbs bakery and a nail salon and more retail space not yet leased at ground level.
There is everything you need a within walking distance, St Lawrence Market 5 minutes, the lake and it’s boardwalk 10 minutes, the distillery district 15 minutes. Bars, restaurants, theatres, pastry shops, clothing stores, fast food, supermarkets and anything else you need ! Always something to do if you’re bored.
The concierge personnel are always courteous and ready to assist if needed. The management also keeps a close eye out for persons using their condos as AIR BNB as it is strictly prohibited !!
There is quite a diverse population, people from all over the world living here under one roof and you would think that most people do find it to be a very friendly atmosphere!!! It really is a cool place to live.
Parking is available if necessary!
Storage space frequently becomes available on building link which is an on-line form of communication between tenants and u can look for a variety of services. You can also voice complaints and communicate for services required from condo management!

The condo is equipped with high speed wifi (1.5 Gbps) and an in suite washer and dryer, and there's an underground parking that can be obtained with extra charges. It is managed by Target Parking.
It is in an incredibly convenient and accessible location with an amazing view. The condominium building is new, built in 2019 and has great amenities such as a gym, games room, movie theatre, outdoor grill station, a party hall and 24-hour security. FreshCo, Tim Hortons and more such stores are located on the ground floor of the building. Public transport is also very accessible from here with a bus stop right in front of the building and TTC subway station is 5 min walk.
The private bedroom is spacious, has a big window with a great view, a closet and the bathroom attached to it (bathroom has two separate entrances). The room is UNFURNISHED. The common areas and the kitchen are well furnished, and the view from the balcony is one to die for(I'm attaching some pictures I took, and you can also see the CN tower from here), and the balcony is great for two people to enjoy your morning or evening coffee.
If interested, please introduce yourself and message me for more details.

Description: Get started right away with a ready-to-use office space 2 persons. Put Your Business on the Fast Track at the Hullmark Centre.Connect with clients throughout Toronto and across Canada with flexible, serviced office space at the Hullmark Centre. Internal access to Sheppard-Yonge subway station puts you within easy reach of 70 destinations across Canadas capital city, including Oriole Train Station, plus the neighboring city of Vaughan. Road links are also excellent. Highways 401 and 404 are both just minutes away, allowing you to access major business areas across the city and reach out to clients all over the country from Windsor in the west all the way to the Ontario-Quebec border in the east.A landmark building located in the popular Willowdale East neighborhood of Toronto, the Hullmark Centre offers a unique and very flexible working environment. Take as much space as you need from a single desk to an entire floor. Create your own private office or enjoy the flexibility of hot-desking in our social coworking areas. If you need a meeting room, you can book one in seconds with our easy-to-use app. Start the day with a workout at LA Fitness just 3 minutes walk away and end it with a meal at one of the nearby restaurants or a stroll around Willowdale Park. Make a home for your business with 108 sqft of private office space in ON, Toronto - Hullmark Center, ideal for 2 employees. Our small offices are fully serviced and have everything taken care of - from the furniture to the high-speed WiFi - so you can focus on driving your business forward. Find flexible office space for rent for as little as a day or stay for longer and personalise your space to suit the unique needs of your business.HQ Private Offices include:  Access to our global network with thousands of locations worldwide Highly trained reception and support team Secure, business-grade technology and WiFi Printers and access to admin support Cleaning, utilities, and security Desk space available by the hour, day, or month Regular networking and community events  Easy booking and account management via our app Customisable and flexible layouts Scale up or move locations to suit your needs High-quality ergonomic furniture Additional access to 538 sqft of shared workspace Pricing starts at 717All images shown in this listing belong to our locations but may not correspond to this specific centre.Enquire now.

Take as much space as you need from a single desk to an entire floor. Create your own private office or enjoy the flexibility of hot-desking in our social coworking areas. If you need a meeting room, you can book one in seconds with our easy-to-use app. Start the day with a workout at LA Fitness just 3 minutes walk away and end it with a meal at one of the nearby restaurants or a stroll around Willowdale Park. Make a home for your business with 1076 sqft of open plan office space in ON, Toronto - Hullmark Center, ideal for 15 employees. Our large offices are fully serviced and have everything taken care of - from the furniture to the high-speed WiFi - so you can focus on driving your business forward. Find flexible office space for rent for as little as a day or stay for longer and personalise your space to suit the unique needs of your business.HQ Open Plan Offices include:  Access to our global network with thousands of locations worldwide Highly trained reception and support team Secure, business-grade technology and WiFi Printers and access to admin support Cleaning, utilities, and security Desk space available by the hour, day, or month Regular networking and community events  Easy booking and account management via our app Customisable and flexible layouts Scale up or move locations to suit your needs High-quality ergonomic furniture Additional access to 1292 sqft of shared workspace Pricing starts at 3416All images shown in this listing belong to our locations but may not correspond to this specific centre.Enquire now.

Title: Currently available: Massive room w balcony - ideal for couples
Description:
Schedule a viewing of this fantastic move-in ready room on Saturday afternoon, March 9, and Sunday morning, March 10. Text 647 869 6908 to set up a viewing of this enormous and charismatic room that is ideal for people who like space and privacy. The room is the size of a studio apartment with a private balcony where you can enjoy the beautiful spring and summer days! The room is very spacious, bright and charismatic with the large private walkout balcony overlooking the garden. The room is in a light-filled 3 bedroom 2nd floor apartment where the kitchen with brandnew appliances and 4-piece bathroom is shared with the 2 other friendly tenants.
The house is steps away from a bus stop and walking distance to the Midland Go Station (~15 min to downtown). You also have access to laundry, including the brandnew laundry machine, that is at the back of the building.
The home is near a fabulous tennis court, splash park, biking and walking trail.
The house is also close to an amazing sandy beach, Bluffers Park, marinas & sailing/yacht clubs. Walking distance to groceries, pharmacy, plaza, Starbucks & Go Station (about 15 mins to downtown by Go). Close to all amenities.
Utilities and wifi included.
Currently available. Can be rented short term or long term.
Parking is available for an additional $100/month.

But schools are just one of this neighbourhood's many strengths. Your home is located close to parks and is just steps from the extensive Beltline Nature Trail. Title: Huge 400 sqft private bedroom with attached bath
Description:
We are looking for long term tenants (preferably one year lease). It’s not a hostel or a crowded home. It is meant for folks who would like to live comfortably in their own private room. This is an upscale accommodation, in a prime location in Scarborough, at very reasonable prices. These were going in Airbnb for $85 to $100 a day. We are giving it at such reasonable rates because we are looking for long term tenants.
It's a huge stylish 4-bedroom house in an upscale exclusive gated community. Very safe with 24/7 security. Very quiet despite being in the middle of all action in a prime location as it is tucked away inside a gated community.
We have following room to offer for rent. Rest of the rooms have been rented.
Bedroom Description - Huge room (around 400 sqft). Has king bed with mattress. Attached bathroom. Desk and chair. Couch. Double closet. Rent $1350 for one person, who will have all the space for themselves.
Rest of the house will remain furnished and decorated as you see in the photos. Kitchen is fully equipped with utensils, cutlery, crockery. Kitchen was renovated last year, floor to ceiling, with brand-new high-end appliances. Washer and Dryer on site. No pets please.
Location: Located in a high-demand location, 10 mins from University of Toronto Scarborough, Scarborough Town Centre, Centennial College and many other educational institutions. Major intersection Kennedy and Ellesmere. TTC is at our doorstep. Several supermarkets, restaurants, cafes, banks, everything is at walkable distance. It’s a very vibrant neighbourhood.
Landscape, gardens, lawn mowing, picking fall leaves, snow removal and garbage is all done by a professional team and is included in the rent. Parking available on our driveway.
All utility accounts will remain with Landlord. Amount will be paid by tenant to the landlord, along with rent on the 3rd day of every month. Actual total amount will divided by the number of other tenants living in the unit. Any surplus of $100 will be paid by tenant to landlord, the next month.

Side Table

6-drawer Dresser
Small Desk with built in Bookshelf & Chair

Available to you would be shared access to the kitchen, bathroom, front porch, back deck (use of BBQ included), and high-efficiency washer and dryer.
Arrangements can be made to use main living room area when not in use (this area is currently an active workspace throughout much of the day).

There is plenty of street parking available with no parking restrictions

Description: Find a flexible choice for business with an open plan office space that supports teams of all sizes. Title: Private office for 1 person

Description: Focus on driving your business forward with a professional office just for you. Put Your Business on the Fast Track at the Hullmark Centre.Connect with clients throughout Toronto and across Canada with flexible, serviced office space at the Hullmark Centre. Internal access to Sheppard-Yonge subway station puts you within easy reach of 70 destinations across Canadas capital city, including Oriole Train Station, plus the neighboring city of Vaughan. Road links are also excellent. Highways 401 and 404 are both just minutes away, allowing you to access major business areas across the city and reach out to clients all over the country from Windsor in the west all the way to the Ontario-Quebec border in the east.A landmark building located in the popular Willowdale East neighborhood of Toronto, the Hullmark Centre offers a unique and very flexible working environment. Take as much space as you need from a single desk to an entire floor. Create your own private office or enjoy the flexibility of hot-desking in our social coworking areas. If you need a meeting room, you can book one in seconds with our easy-to-use app. Start the day with a workout at LA Fitness just 3 minutes walk away and end it with a meal at one of the nearby restaurants or a stroll around Willowdale Park. Make a home for your business with 86 sqft of private office space in ON, Toronto - Hullmark Center, ideal for 1 employee. Our small offices are fully serviced and have everything taken care of - from the furniture to the high-speed WiFi - so you can focus on driving your business forward. Find flexible office space for rent for as little as a day or stay for longer and personalise your space to suit the unique needs of your business.HQ Private Offices include:  Access to our global network with thousands of locations worldwide Highly trained reception and support team Secure, business-grade technology and WiFi Printers and access to admin support Cleaning, utilities, and security Desk space available by the hour, day, or month Regular networking and community events  Easy booking and account management via our app Customisable and flexible layouts Scale up or move locations to suit your needs High-quality ergonomic furniture Additional access to 538 sqft of shared workspace Pricing starts at 603All images shown in this listing belong to our locations but may not correspond to this specific centre.Enquire now.

Title: Coworking space
Address: 4773-4789 Yonge Street, North York, ON, M2N 0G3
Description: Get to work among a like-minded community in our shared office space. Our coworking spaces are designed with collaboration in mind and come with all the details taken care of. Reserve a dedicated desk or drop in and hot-desk and open your business up to new possibilities. Put Your Business on the Fast Track at the Hullmark Centre.Connect with clients throughout Toronto and across Canada with flexible, serviced office space at the Hullmark Centre. Internal access to Sheppard-Yonge subway station puts you within easy reach of 70 destinations across Canadas capital city, including Oriole Train Station, plus the neighboring city of Vaughan. Road links are also excellent. Highways 401 and 404 are both just minutes away, allowing you to access major business areas across the city and reach out to clients all over the country from Windsor in the west all the way to the Ontario-Quebec border in the east.A landmark building located in the popular Willowdale East neighborhood of Toronto, the Hullmark Centre offers a unique and very flexible working environment. Take as much space as you need from a single desk to an entire floor. Create your own private office or enjoy the flexibility of hot-desking in our social coworking areas. If you need a meeting room, you can book one in seconds with our easy-to-use app. Start the day with a workout at LA Fitness just 3 minutes walk away and end it with a meal at one of the nearby restaurants or a stroll around Willowdale Park. HQ Coworking includes:  Access to our global network with thousands of locations worldwide Highly trained reception and support team Secure, business-grade technology and WiFi Printers and access to admin support Cleaning, utilities, and security Desk space available by the hour, day, or month Choice between open-plan space or a shared office Option to take a dedicated desk reserved for you Regular networking and community events  Easy booking and account management via our appAll images shown in this listing belong to our locations but may not correspond to this specific centre.Enquire now.

Title: Looking for a Female Roommate in a 3 bed, 2 Wash apartment
Description:
Hello everyone,
I am looking for a third roommate (female only) in a 3 bedroom and 2 washroom apartment.
The move in date is April 1st 2024 and first and last month’s deposit is required before moving in
You will have your own room (unfurnished) and access to all the common areas (Kitchen, and Living/dining room) and will share the bathroom with one other person (female).
There is a laundry room on every other floor of the building with 2 washers and 2 dryers on each floor.
The building is close to Glencairn station and you can get there by a 7 min bus ride. Davisville station is a 12 min bus ride away. Yonge and Eglinton can be reached by a 15 min bus ride as well.
A new Metrolinx station is scheduled to open this year which would be an 8 min walk away.
The main intersection close to the building is Bathurst and Roselawn.
The numbers:
Rent: $623 (subject to increase once every year as determined by the Province which has been between 2.5 to 5% in the past years)
Hydro: $20 to $30 per person depending on usage (the building does not have AC but heat and water is included in the rent)
Internet: $31 per person (Bell unlimited Fibe 1 gig)
Underground Parking can be arranged with the building for $100

Title: Short term $3900 Furnished 3 Bedroom College & Bathurst
Description:
Available date : April 1st. 2024
Rent for April & May is $3900 per month.
No wait for crowded elevators!
This newly renovated 3-bedroom apartment with a great mix of modern and traditional styles.
Conveniently located in downtown, 15 mins walk to U of T. 10 mins to Annex & Korean town,
10 minutes walk to Chinatown, 15 mins walk to Queen st west. Grocery store, Fresh CO. is 5 mins walk.
Super comfortable in-floor heating throughout, two skylights, a gas fireplace and the latest in accent lighting.
The apartment is also has Energy exchange system installed. The system can turn hot air into cold air which is the AC in the summer, then it can turn cold air into hot air for the winter.
The apartment has touchscreen door locks which allowing you to go keys FREE!!
The apartment is full of modern conveniences but warm and bright with exposed brick and reclaimed wood stairs, fireplace mantle, and sliding barn door by local artist Lubo Design.
The living room is fitted with a 50" flat screen TV. Beautiful century old exposed brick from Toronto’s famous Brickworks spans the entire length of the second floor.
The kitchen features brand new stainless steel appliances with a west-looking window overlooking the verdant backyard and laneway behind the house.
The second floor bedroom has a full size bed and French doors that open to the deck where you can enjoy the peace and greenery of the backyard. All bedrooms have room-darkening blinds when you need some sleep.
The two dormer bedrooms on the 3rd floor have queen sized beds and a cottage in the city feel.
Both bedrooms have spacious closets.
The high-speed Internet is also included in the rent price.
WiFi is Fiberoptic 1.5 Gbps total download speed Internet with super low ping (fast response).
The wifi and Netflix are included in the rent.
Requirement : Application, first & last month rent, Credit score check, employment letter, references.
Bedding could be included, depends on the situation.
Furniture deposit will be required.
Parking might be available upon discussion.
If interested, we also have virtual tour video available!
Thank you for looking!!

Title: 200 Dufferin Street - Lord Dufferin Apartments Apartment for Ren
Amenities: Elevator in Building
Description: Lord Dufferin Apartments offers stylish, renovated apartments in Liberty Village's west end. Packed with must-have on-site amenities and boasting a transit score of 100, these apartments will help you enhance your Toronto living experience. Offering pet friendly bachelor, 1 and 2 bedroom suites, you'll love the earthy tones and contemporary finishes outfitting these cozy apartments. The rental suites at Lord Dufferin Apartments feature dishwashers, balconies, and open-concept layouts, while our friendly on-site management and concierge staff address your maintenance needs and secure your peace of mind. Residents also enjoy a gym, laundry facilities, storage room with lockers, and party room all on-site; while just outside you'll find a cozy swimming pool and lounge area, plus a personal dog park for resident use. There's no shortage of amenities in Liberty Village, and Lord Dufferin Apartments puts you walking distance from some of its best. Take your workout outdoors with the paved path along Lake Ontario just steps from your door, or spend a day at the CNE, just as close by. With TTC bus and streetcar stops at your door, including 24-hour options on Queen Street, easy access to the Gardiner Expressway and QEW, and the Exhibition GO Station just minutes away, the entire city of Toronto is at your fingertips. Lord Dufferin Apartments is a Certified Rental Building and offers affordable rental living in the heart of one of Toronto's most vibrant neighbourhoods. Live at the edge of one of Toronto's most vibrant neighbourhoods, Liberty Village! The Lord Dufferin is ideal for anyone who enjoys convenience. You are minutes to 24-hour bus and streetcar transit, the Exhibition Go Station, you are walking distance to Queen West shopping, a variety of parks, restaurants, coffee shops, and grocery stores, this location has it all!Building Overivew
